comments: Professor Neilson is an absolutely wonderful professor. I took one of her classes last semester and I\'m in another now. Will probably take more in the future. Very clear and easy to understand lectures, gives extensive feedback on papers, and a nice person. You can tell she is very passionate about art history.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Respected (2)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Her lectures are interesting and inspired and she clearly is passionate and has extensive knowledge on her topics, but she is a tough grader. There isn\'t much daily work but when the papers hit they can hit hard if you haven\'t put the effort in. She is a little intimidating, but she is really understanding and sweet when you do talk to her.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Respected (2)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  TOUGH GRADER  AMAZING LECTURES
comments: Tough. If you take this class, expect to put in the work. Also, expect for it to be one of the harder classes you\'ll take at Oberlin. She\'s incredible smart, but if she gets the sense you\'re not in the class one hundred percent you\'re not in a good position. Stay on her good side! And you will learn A TON!

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Respected (2)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  RESPECTED  AMAZING LECTURES
comments: Really enjoyed her lectures because she is obviously knowledgeable and passionate about the subjects she teaches. Her grading is tough, but not unreasonable and she gives really helpful feedback. She is also incredibly helpful during office hours and will help you as much as she can. Would definitely recommend taking her courses!

comments: great prof! take a class with her and you won\'t regret. she gives amazing lectures, really. getting an A is hard but still possible. come to her office hour she\'s helpful and pretty understanding.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Respected (2)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Professor Neilson\'s lectures are clear, easy to follow, and engaging- she asks for class participation regularly. After each paper, she gives in-depth critiques of what to improve on... getting an A is extremely tough, but she offers generous office hours and extra review sessions before exams. A kind, engaging, sensible professor overall.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Respected (2)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: definitely take a class with christina neilson. she\'s passionate about renaissance art and a brilliant, easy-to-follow and endearing lecturer. best of all, she really reaches out to her students.
